content: welcome to the pattern for our emma roll neck cat sweater with optional sleeves you can download the written pattern for free in our ravelry store and view the accompanying video tutorial on the catventurous crochet youtube channel charlotte & melba wish you happy crocheting crochet level experienced beginners and above certain sizing requirements may involve advanced beginner to intermediate skills if you are not yet comfortable with sizing a sweater of this style check out the listings for our prince basic cat jacket or ally easy fit button up cat sweater materials * medium to bulky weight yarn * crochet hook to suit your yarn * yarn needle * scissors * measuring tape * stitch markers optional stitches/techniques * slip knot onto hook * making a chain * single_crochet single_crochet * single_crochet into back loop only single_crochet blo * single_crochet decrease optional * slip_stitch slip_stitch * triple crochet tc * triple crochet increase * triple crochet decrease * weaving in ends * invisible stitch to finish * disguising a seam optional *taking measurements and sizing a garment **important these sweaters are intended to be stylish and fun for you and your cat for their safety please supervise your cat at all times while they are wearing this sweater or any other item that secures around the neck within which claws may become entangled or that contains items such as buttons which may present a choking hazard please do not use this pattern to make your cat hate you ** catventurous crochet simple and fun crochet patterns for #fashionablycatventurous kitties supermeowdel catventurer melba @adventurepussmelba
